content: प्रबोधः {@--1@} Awaking(<ab>fig.</ab> also), awakening; regaining one's consciousness, consciousness; अप्रबोधाय सुष्वाप <ls>R. 12. 50</ls>; मोहाद्भूत्कष्टतरः प्रबोधः <ls n="R.">14. 56.</ls> {@--2@} Blowing, expanding (of flowers). {@--3@} Wakefulness, sleeplessness; चिरप्रबोधान्न संभावितं धर्मासनमध्यासितुं <ls>Ś. 6.</ls> {@--4@} Vigilance, watchfulness. {@--5@} Knowledge, understanding, wisdom, removal of delusion, real knowledge; as in प्रबोधचंद्रोदय; <ls>R. 5. 65.</ls> {@--6@} Consolation. {@--7@} Reviving the fragrance of a perfume. {@--8@} Explaining.
